metadata.title: CVE-2015-2269 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities inlib/javascript-static.js in Moodle through 2.5.9, 2.6.x before 2.6.9, 2.7.xbefore 2.7.6, and 2.8.x before 2.8.4 allow remote authenticated users toinject arbitrary web script or HTML via a (1) alt or (2) title attribute inan IMG element.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
